overview: Ryan, a new student, finds difficulties in adjusting to the lessons. This becomes the beginning of his meetings with Laras, a clever and modest girl, who helps him. The intimacy between Ryan and Laras causes Anggie to get jealous. So Anggie and her friends gang up on Laras, and this misunderstanding causes a rift with Ryan. Then Ryan admits that he is in love with Laras.
title: For You
